name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: Top a ready pizza dough with tomato sauce, sliced mozzarella, fresh tomato slices, and basil. Drizzle with olive oil and bake in a preheated oven at 475°F for about 10-12 minutes.

name: Vegan Chili
description: Sauté onions, garlic, and bell peppers. Add carrots and celery, cook until soft. Stir in tomatoes and beans. Season with chili powder, cumin, and paprika. Simmer for 30 minutes.

name: Banana Bread
description: Mash ripe bananas. Mix with sugar, egg, and melted butter. Combine with flour, baking soda, and cinnamon. Pour into a loaf pan and bake at 350°F for about 50 minutes.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Toss chopped romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese. Serve with a squeeze of lemon juice and freshly ground black pepper.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Brown beef slices in butter, remove. Cook mushrooms and onions in same pan. Stir in flour, then broth, and return beef. Stir in sour cream and mustard, serve over cooked noodles.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, then grill. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger, add tomato puree and cream, then cooked chicken. Simmer and garnish with cilantro.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Mash ripe avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread on toasted bread. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with red pepper flakes.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Cook spaghetti. Render pancetta in oil. Beat eggs with Parmesan, salt, and pepper. Toss hot pasta with pancetta, then egg mixture. Serve immediately with extra cheese.

name: Butternut Squash Soup
description: Roast butternut squash until tender. Sauté onions and garlic, add squash and broth. Blend until smooth, stir in cream. Season with thyme, salt, and pepper.

name: Greek Salad
description: Combine chopped cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, feta cheese, and olives. Dress with olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Shakshuka
description: Sauté onions, garlic, and bell peppers with spices. Add tomatoes and simmer until thick. Crack eggs into sauce. Cover and cook until eggs are set. Garnish with cilantro.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Season fish and fry until cooked. Combine cabbage, mayo, and lime for slaw. Serve fish in tortillas with slaw and chipotle sauce.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Sauté onions, garlic, and mushrooms. Add rice, cook until translucent. Gradually add broth, stirring constantly. Finish with Parmesan cheese and butter.

name: Pad Thai
description: Soak rice noodles. Fry eggs, remove. Cook garlic, add noodles, sauce, and a little water. Mix in egg, bean sprouts, and green onions. Serve with lime and peanuts.

name: Pumpkin Pie
description: Mix pumpkin puree with eggs, cream, sugar, and spices. Pour into pie crust. Bake at 375°F for about 50 minutes. Cool before serving.
